title: Giro d’Italia: Who Can Derail Roglič? Ranking the Favorites, From ‘GC Gee’ to the UAE Big Three
content:
Who gets the Giro d'Italia gold stars? We pick the pink jersey contenders for what could be the most wide-open grand tour of the year.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia: Who Can Derail Roglič? Ranking the Favorites, From ‘GC Gee’ to the UAE Big Three on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
